concept.definition: Previous cyber event in the last five years that has or could result in a direct financial loss or any legal or regulatory action threatened or initiated? — response indicator code.

designation.value: Cyberévénement survenu au cours des cinq dernières années qui a entraîné ou pourrait entraîner une perte financière directe, ou toute poursuite en justice ou une mesure réglementaire potentielle ou imminente?

concept.display: Is access to personal information and/or third-party confidential information restricted by job position?
concept.definition: Is access to personal information and/or third-party confidential information restricted by job position? — response indicator code.

designation.value: L’accès aux renseignements personnels ou aux renseignements confidentiels de tiers est-il restreint par le poste?

concept.display: Does the applicant follow a process for regularly downloading and installing patches and use up-to-date anti-virus and anti-malware protection on all endpoints (desktops, laptops, servers, emails, etc.) and firewalls on internal access points?
concept.definition: Does the applicant follow a process for regularly downloading and installing patches and use up-to-date anti-virus and anti-malware protection on all endpoints (desktops, laptops, servers, emails, etc.) and firewalls on internal access points? — response indicator code.

designation.value: Le demandeur suit-il un processus pour télécharger et installer régulièrement des correctifs,  et utilise-t-il une protection antivirus et antimaliciels à jour à tous les points d’extrémité (ordinateurs de bureau, ordinateurs portables, serveurs, courriels, etc.) et des pare-feu aux points d’accès internes?

concept.display: Are your employee, customer, and other physical and electronic records maintained in a secure environment with limited access?
concept.definition: Are your employee, customer, and other physical and electronic records maintained in a secure environment with limited access? — response indicator code.

designation.value: Les dossiers de vos employés, de vos clients et autres documents physiques et électroniques sont-ils conservés dans un environnement sécurisé dont l’accès est limité?

concept.display: Does the applicant have a disaster recovery plan, business continuity plan, or equivalent to respond to a computer system disruption?
concept.definition: Does the applicant have a disaster recovery plan, business continuity plan, or equivalent to respond to a computer system disruption? — response indicator code.

designation.value: Le demandeur a-t-il un plan de reprise après sinistre, un plan de continuité des activités ou l’équivalent en cas de perturbation du système informatique?

concept.display: Is there a Chief Information and/or Chief Security Officer (or equivalent)?
concept.definition: Is there a Chief Information and/or Chief Security Officer (or equivalent)? — response indicator code.

designation.value: Y a-t-il un dirigeant principal de l’information ou un dirigeant principal de la sécurité (ou l’équivalent)?

concept.display: Do you have a comprehensive Information Security and Privacy Policy that addresses issues such as email use (including size limitations), document retention/destruction, etc.?
concept.definition: Do you have a comprehensive Information Security and Privacy Policy that addresses issues such as email use (including size limitations), document retention/destruction, etc.? — response indicator code.

designation.value: Avez-vous une politique complète en matière de sécurité de l’information et de protection des renseignements personnels qui traite de questions comme l’utilisation des courriels (y compris les limites de taille), la conservation et la destruction des documents?

concept.display: Are all users issued unique IDs and passwords when connecting to or accessing the internal network and do passwords require periodic changes, minimum length and mixed case, letters, numbers and special characters?
concept.definition: Are all users issued unique IDs and passwords when connecting to or accessing the internal network and do passwords require periodic changes, minimum length and mixed case, letters, numbers and special characters? — response indicator code.

designation.value: Tous les utilisateurs reçoivent-ils des identifiants et des mots de passe uniques lorsqu’ils se connectent ou accèdent au réseau interne? Les mots de passe doivent-ils être modifiés périodiquement, avoir une longueur minimale et contenir des majuscules, des minuscules, des lettres, des chiffres et des caractères spéciaux?

concept.display: Do you provide regular security training/information to all people who have access to personally identifying information, whether in paper or electronic format?
concept.definition: Do you provide regular security training/information to all people who have access to personally identifying information, whether in paper or electronic format? — response indicator code.

designation.value: Offrez-vous régulièrement de la formation et de l’information sur la sécurité à toutes les personnes qui ont accès à des renseignements d’identification personnelle, que ce soit en format papier ou électronique?

concept.display: Do you use encryption techniques for secure communications and the transfer of confidential information?
concept.definition: Do you use encryption techniques for secure communications and the transfer of confidential information? — response indicator code.

designation.value: Utilisez-vous des techniques de cryptage pour les communications sécurisées et le transfert de renseignements confidentiels?

concept.display: Does the applicant provide professional services in, or for any of the following areas: Accounting/Actuarial, Construction Project Management, Design Build (Construction), Consulting in Environmental, Financial or Marketing, Geophysical Mapping/Surveying, Fire, Health and Safety, Lobbying/Politics, Legal/Law, Mergers & Acquisitions or Business Valuations, Medical or Pharmaceuticals, Real Estate, Oil & Gas?

concept.definition: Does the applicant have prior E&O liability insurance? — response indicator code.
